objects.specification: A light gray textured floor panel with a subtle stone-like pattern, featuring a non-reflective matte finish for durability and easy maintenance. The panel has beveled edges and consistent thickness to provide a stable walking surface.
A smooth off-white interior wall segment with a uniform matte finish, designed to form part of the classroom enclosure. The wall has crisp edges and seamless joints to adjoining panels.
A smooth off-white interior wall segment with a uniform matte finish, designed to form part of the classroom enclosure. The wall has crisp edges and seamless joints to adjoining panels.
A smooth off-white interior wall segment with a uniform matte finish, designed to form part of the classroom enclosure. The wall has crisp edges and seamless joints to adjoining panels.
A smooth off-white interior wall segment with a uniform matte finish, designed to form part of the classroom enclosure. The wall has crisp edges and seamless joints to adjoining panels.

A larger teacher desk crafted from rich dark wood, featuring a broad rectangular surface with reinforced edges, a modesty panel at the front, and three drawers of varying sizes on one side for storage. The desk has sturdy, slightly thicker legs and a polished finish that highlights the natural wood grain. The design balances functionality with a classic professional appearance.

An executive-style chair made from dark wood with a comfortable cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in black faux leather. The chair features armrests with matching wood accents, a five-point metal base with rolling casters, and a slightly reclining back for ergonomic support during long teaching sessions.

A large flat rectangular whiteboard with a thin white metal frame and a glossy white writing surface that facilitates smooth dry erase marker use. The board has a minimalistic border and integrated marker tray at the bottom, designed for presentations and lectures.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a matte black housing, lens protruding from the front, subtle venting on the sides, and mounting bracket on the top. The device includes adjustable hinges for fine alignment and emits bright, high-resolution projection for classroom presentations.

A tall wooden bookshelf crafted from dark wood, featuring five evenly spaced shelves filled with books of various colors and sizes. The bookshelf has a simple rectangular frame with a flat top and slight base molding for stability. The shelves are slightly recessed to keep books secure.

A circular wall clock with a slim black metal frame, a white face with black hour and minute markings, and slender black hands. The clock has a clear glass cover and a small, discreet hanging bracket on the back.

A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage emerging from a simple ceramic pot that has a matte white finish. The plant features multiple branches and leaves to create a natural, organic accent.
A cylindrical waste bin made of dark gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile, featuring a smooth matte finish and a removable inner liner for easy emptying.
A cylindrical waste bin made of dark gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile, featuring a smooth matte finish and a removable inner liner for easy emptying.

A square LED ceiling light panel with a thin white frame and diffused cover for uniform illumination. The fixture is shallow in depth and designed to be recessed or surface-mounted for modern lighting.

A square LED ceiling light panel with a thin white frame and diffused cover for uniform illumination. The fixture is shallow in depth and designed to be recessed or surface-mounted for modern lighting.

A square LED ceiling light panel with a thin white frame and diffused cover for uniform illumination. The fixture is shallow in depth and designed to be recessed or surface-mounted for modern lighting.

An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring colorful graphics and informative text about academic subjects. The poster is mounted on the wall with minimal hardware and has a thin white border to enhance readability and aesthetics.

A rectangular window with a white painted wooden frame, featuring clear glass panes divided by thin mullions into four sections. The window has a minimal sill and a flush mounting style for clean interior integration.

A rectangular window with a white painted wooden frame, featuring clear glass panes divided by thin mullions into four sections. The window has a minimal sill and a flush mounting style for clean interior integration.

A simple student desk constructed from light tan wood with a rectangular tabletop supported by four slender legs, featuring gently rounded edges and a smooth finish. The tabletop is designed for single occupancy with proportions offering ample workspace, with a height comfortable for seated students. The legs are slightly tapered to provide stability and a modern minimalistic aesthetic.

A simple student chair constructed from light tan wood featuring a contoured seat and backrest for ergonomic support. The chair has four legs with slight outward flare, a slender profile, and seamless joinery for durability. The backrest height aligns with standard ergonomics to ensure comfort over extended periods of use.
